title: Bloomberg Markets: Piegza Says Difficult to Change Fed's Mind
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Piegza Says Difficult to Change Fed's Mind
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Lindsey Piegza Chief Economist Stifel Financial Discussing Federal Reserve officials saying on Wednesday that they would begin running off their $4.5 trillion balance sheet “relatively soon” and left their benchmark policy rate unchanged as they assess progress toward their inflation goal.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
